thread.title: Jazbaa BO collection: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan & Irrfan Khan starrer receives strong response in the opening weekend
thread.title_full: Jazbaa BO collection: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan & Irrfan Khan starrer receives strong response in the opening weekend

author: Maggie Davis
title: Jazbaa BO collection: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan & Irrfan Khan starrer receives strong response in the opening weekend
text:
Jazbaa BO collection: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan & Irrfan Khan starrer receives strong response in the opening weekend By Maggie Davis on October 13, 2015 at 9:04 AM Comments B-town beauty Aishwarya Rai Bachchan has made her comeback in the industry with the thriller-drama movie ‘Jazbaa’ . The movie directed by Sanjay Gupta also starred Irrfan Khan in the lead role. From the time it hit the silver screens, the movie showed a solid growth. Aishwarya who played the role of a criminal lawyer and a single mother showed a stunning performance. She played the character of Anuradha Verma in the film. The Aishwarya and Irrfan starrer film received tremendous response in the opening weekend. The movie had released on October 9 and it is showing consistence performance. On the day of the release, the film garnered Rs. 4.23 crores. But on Saturday (October 10) there was a rise in its collection. Aishwarya starrer film managed to collect Rs. 5.49 crores and on Sunday (October 11) it collected Rs. 5.52 crores. (ALSO READ: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan wins the critics over with her performance in Jazbaa) The Sanjay Gupta directorial flick could not garner as much as films like ‘Singh Is Bliing’ or ‘Talvar’ that hit the screens on October 2. These two films that released on the same day are receiving solid response. Other movies that received good response on the opening weekend were ‘Katti Batti’ and ‘Hero’ . The film’s ( Jazbaa ) box office collection details were posted by trade analyst Taran Adarsh on the micro-blogging site Twitter: Jazbaa biz witnesses SOLID growth on Sat. Good word of mouth has translated into strong biz. Fri 4.23 cr, Sat 5.49 cr. Total: 9.72 cr. 
— taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) October 11, 2015 Aishwarya Rai Bachchan made her comeback after five long years. She was last seen in Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s directorial flick ‘Guzaarish’ in which Hrithik Roshan was also featured in the lead role. But it looks like ‘Jazbaa’ has become the perfect comeback for the beauty. The movie’s box office collection is expected to soar in the coming days. Until now the Sanjay Gupta directorial flick has minted Rs. 15.24 crores. (ALSO READ: Now, a smartphone named after Bollywood film Jazbaa) 
  9:04 AM Topics:
